supporting_spans: "No, my dear major," continued Paganel; "but, if you wish, I will tell you, in this connection, a little Arab story that occurs to me."
reasoning: Evidence supports: This excerpt suggests that Paganel is telling a story that relates to the claim.

analysis.claim_text: He once found bribery entries in his father’s old ledgers, reported them, and saw his father’s colleague dismissed; temporary gossip made him wary of the upper nobility.

sub_claims.text: He found bribery entries in his father’s old ledgers.
He reported the bribery entries to the authorities.
His father’s colleague was dismissed due to the reported bribery entries.
Temporary gossip made him wary of the upper nobility.

analysis.reasoning: Evidence supports: This excerpt suggests that Paganel is telling a story that relates to the claim.
